perturbation.original_text:
(a) In full consideration of the provision of the services of the Blockchain Administrator set forth herein, the Fund shall pay the
Blockchain Administrator a fees calculated at the annual rate of 0.20% of the value of the Fund’s average annual net assets. Such fee shall be
accrued daily and paid monthly in arrears.
perturbation.changed_text:
(a) In full consideration of the provision of the services of the Blockchain Administrator set forth herein, the Fund shall pay the
Blockchain Administrator a fee calculated at the annual rate of 0.20% of the value of the Fund’s average annual net assets. Such fee shall be
accrued daily and paid quarterly in arrears.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that the fee is to be paid monthly in arrears, while the modified contract states that the fee is to be paid quarterly in arrears. This creates an in-text contradiction regarding the payment schedule.

perturbation.original_text:
(a) This Agreement shall become effective as of the first date above written. This Agreement may be terminated at any time, without
the payment of any penalty, upon 60 days' written notice, by the vote of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund or by the vote
of the Fund's Trustees or by the Blockchain Administrator.
perturbation.changed_text:
(a) This Agreement shall become effective as of the first date above written. This Agreement may be terminated at any time, without
the payment of any penalty, upon 30 days' written notice, by the vote of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund or by the vote
of the Fund's Trustees or by the Blockchain Administrator.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that the agreement can be terminated with 60 days written notice. The modified contract changes this to 30 days written notice. This directly contradicts the original clause, creating uncertainty about the required notice period for termination.

perturbation.original_text:
(b) This Agreement shall continue in effect for two years from the date hereof, and thereafter shall continue automatically for
successive annual periods, provided that such continuance is specifically approved at least annually by (A) the vote of the Board, or by the vote
of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund and (B) the vote of a majority of the Fund's directors who are not parties to this
Agreement or "interested persons" (as such term is defined in Section 2(a)(19) of the Investment Fund Act) of any such party, in accordance with
the requirements of the Investment Fund Act.
perturbation.changed_text:
(b) This Agreement shall continue in effect for one year from the date hereof, and thereafter shall continue automatically for
successive annual periods, provided that such continuance is specifically approved at least annually by (A) the vote of the Board, or by the vote
of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund and (B) the vote of a majority of the Fund's directors who are not parties to this
Agreement or "interested persons" (as such term is defined in Section 2(a)(19) of the Investment Fund Act) of any such party, in accordance with
the requirements of the Investment Fund Act.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a two-year initial term, whereas the modified text shortens this to one year. This creates a contradiction regarding the initial duration of the agreement, which could lead to disputes about the contract's lifespan.
